name: lambda-gifbot
description: Returns GIF based on given search term
author: Case Consulting

scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --template-file template.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-prefix lambda-gifbot --s3-bucket case-consulting-mgmt-sam-deployments --stack-name lambda-gifbot --profile mgmt
scripts.local: npm run build && sam local invoke GifBotFunction -e event.json
